content.rendered:
Product name: disposable insulin syringe

Description:

  1. specification: 1ml, 0.5ml
  2. Type: U-100,U-40
  3. Hypodermic needle: 30G, 29G
  4. Sanitary standard and quality in accordance with the CE, FDA, ISO9001, ISO13485 standards
  5. Packing: PE or Blister Poich, Inner Box, Export Carton. OEM can be arranged

 

Product introduction

1, the jacket is transparent, easy to observe the liquid surface and bubbles

2. The 6:100 conical joint designed according to the national standard can be used with any product with standard 6:100 conical joint.

3, the product is well sealed, does not leak

4, sterile, pyrogen free

5, the scale ink adhesion is strong, does not fall off

6, the fine needle tip configuration, to achieve painless injection, reduce user fear

7, humanization considerations, the color of the cap is different from the insulin intensity (40U/100U) to prevent the use of the wrong concentration

8, one-piece structure, the amount of liquid residue is very small, to ensure the accuracy of drug delivery

Product important features:

The needle tube is ultra-fine, sharp, and particularly easy to penetrate;

No dead space syringes avoid the waste of insulin;

The bold scale is easier to read.

Precautions for use

1. Use a new needle for each injection.

2. With a needle storage companion pen may cause insulin leakage and bubble formation in the core.

3. Discharge air every time.

4. When exhausting, be sure to let the insulin pen drop out. This is done to ensure that there are no air bubbles in the pen. Ensure that the dose is sufficient.

5. When the needle of the accompaniment pen penetrates into the skin, press the injection button to maintain the pressure and press it firmly on the button while slowly counting to 5. Then, it is confirmed that the injection is completed when the 0 dose mark is at the center of the window.

• None
  • China
  • According to quantity

Usage：
1.For insulin injection;.
2 With fixed needle;
3 Material: medical-grade PP or PVC;
4 Transparent barrel and plunger;
5 Latex or latex free rubber piston.
Package :100 syringes in pack
